H3.text: what was the capital city of the east roman empire. Constantinople

A4.text: Over the next six years, he rebuilt the city of Byzantium as a new capital that he called 'New Rome' (later named Constantinople).

A5.text: Constantinople had now entrenched itself as the empire's capital.
